info.title: Slack Multiparty Direct Messages API
info.description: The API for management Slack Multiparty Direct Messagess

get.summary: Closes a multiparty direct message channel.
get.description: Closes a multiparty direct message channel.

get.summary: Fetches history of messages and events from a multiparty direct message.
get.description: Fetches history of messages and events from a multiparty direct message.

parameters.name: channel
parameters.description: Multiparty direct message to fetch history for.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Number of messages to return, between 1 and 1000.

parameters.name: inclusive
parameters.description: Include messages with latest or oldest timestamp in results.

parameters.name: latest
parameters.description: End of time range of messages to include in results.

parameters.name: oldest
parameters.description: Start of time range of messages to include in results.

get.summary: Lists multiparty direct message channels for the calling user.
get.description: Lists multiparty direct message channels for the calling user.

get.summary: Sets the read cursor in a multiparty direct message channel.
get.description: Sets the read cursor in a multiparty direct message channel.

parameters.name: channel
parameters.description: multiparty direct message channel to set reading cursor in.

parameters.name: ts
parameters.description: Timestamp of the most recently seen message.

get.summary: This method opens a multiparty direct message.
get.description: This method opens a multiparty direct message.

parameters.name: users
parameters.description: Comma separated lists of users.  The ordering of the users is preserved whenever a MPIM group is returned.
